# Shiny App: DDP Project

* Choose a dataset from a dropdown (3 datasets, pre-chosen)
  * allow selection of variables (with default)
  * see `conditionalPanel`
* Create 3 caret models
  * Plot actual vs predicted for models
  * Assess accuracy with RMSE
* Overall results on main tab
* detailed model assessment on 3 other tabs
